title: TokenMe.w
author: TokenMe.w
content: I am looking for a bounty hunter manager to manage, promote and increase my project social presence especially in twitter for 5 months. My salary per month is $400 which i will pay $200 every 2 weeks I am looking for someone with a good record of actually making good progress with the twitter popularity of the project, ensuring activities, trending activities, and telegram activities. submit your applications to me via my inbox in bitcoin talk

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: What is your project about? Is it a token or something else? Either way, you should look into the Services board. There are a few individuals offering what you're looking for: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Haven't you got one yet? Try contacting one of this lists,I doubt whether all are willing to work on altcoins promotion, so far some have never done so. See more details into their respective announcement threads.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: I'm sure if you bid on this service board then someone is interested as @Omega said or better to move this thread to service board for more attention.Especially if you share details about the project, maybe more people will understand and see some of the active managers, maybe it will be what you are looking for.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: noorman0 on May 28, 2023, 01:10:34 PMHaven't you got one yet? Try contacting one of this lists,I doubt whether all are willing to work on altcoins promotion, so far some have never done so. See more details into their respective announcement threads.What the OP is looking for is not bounty management but bounty hunter with different social media alt accounts who can hype their project on Twitter and Telegram. That's why he/she stated they need a bounty hunter, not a bounty manager.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on May 28, 2023, 10:12:55 AMI am looking for a bounty hunter manager to manage, promote and increase my project social presence especially in twitter for 5 months. My salary per month is $400 which i will pay $200 every 2 weeks I am looking for someone with a good record of actually making good progress with the twitter popularity of the project, ensuring activities, trending activities, and telegram activities. submit your applications to me via my inbox in bitcoin talkWhy are you looking for one bounty hunter if you want to increase your Twitter followers then launch a bounty campaign or a contest, invite people to follow for a chance to win $200, or if you really insist on only one then be descriptive on what your goal and what you want to achieve on your Twitter account so the applicant will have an idea if they can do this job.I'm sure there will be many takers if you post this in the service section or the bounty section.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on May 28, 2023, 10:12:55 AMI am looking for a bounty hunter manager to manage, promote and increase my project social presence especially in twitter for 5 months. You should really give some more important information, at least some basics about the business in question, whether it is a start-up or already active. It is also important, apart from Twitter, which other networks would work on. The requirements are not the same for Twitter and TikTok or even forums for example.It is also very important that you present some expectations and goals that you want to achieve. To start from the beginning and make noticeable results, I think that $100 a week might be a small amount.Quote from: coin-investor on May 28, 2023, 02:57:37 PMWhy are you looking for one bounty hunter if you want to increase your Twitter followers then launch a bounty campaign or a contest, invite people to follow for a chance to win $200, or if you really insist on only one then be descriptive on what your goal and what you want to achieve on your Twitter account so the applicant will have an idea if they can do this job.He wants a person who will manage his social media accounts. He awkwardly said he was looking for a bounty hunter because it was not a bounty program, but a paid ($100 per week) position for a social media manager.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on May 28, 2023, 10:12:55 AMI am looking for a bounty hunter manager to manage, promote and increase my project social presence especially in twitter for 5 months. My salary per month is $400 which i will pay $200 every 2 weeks I am looking for someone with a good record of actually making good progress with the twitter popularity of the project, ensuring activities, trending activities, and telegram activities. submit your applications to me via my inbox in bitcoin talkPosting your Twitter and Telegram handle will give an idea of what niche or interest you are targeting since this is managing a social media account you should give your prospect an idea of what kind of niche they are expecting, I'm sure it includes preparing what to tweet what tags to add and interest they will target to grow the account's followers, people here may even follow you if you post your Twitter handle and find it interesting.When growing your social media presence confidence is important and confidence is showing it everywhere, where possible.

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: TokenMe.w on May 28, 2023, 10:12:55 AMI am looking for a bounty hunter manager to manage, promote and increase my project social presence especially in twitter for 5 months. My salary per month is $400 which i will pay $200 every 2 weeks I am looking for someone with a good record of actually making good progress with the twitter popularity of the project, ensuring activities, trending activities, and telegram activities. submit your applications to me via my inbox in bitcoin talkYou asked in the wrong thread section op. Then second is can you please specify if you are looking for a Bounty hunter or a Bounty Manager?        And then what you are looking for should be here, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0, then it should be better if you apply for copper member here in the forum so that everyone can send you a message here in the forum, and also indicate your telegram channel or where you can be contacted as well here too.
